description: The cause of the installation issue appears to be related to the absence or misconfiguration of specific drivers required for certain Surface devices on Windows 10. Users are suggested to visit the Windows 10 download page and check for available drivers specific to their Surface model. This indicates that without the correct drivers installed, the functioning of the Surface devices may be impaired, leading to difficulties with updates and installations. Furthermore, referencing the support page highlights the critical need for keeping device drivers up-to-date to ensure compatibility with Windows updates. It is essential for system administrators to ensure that these drivers are installed correctly to maintain optimal functionality for Surface devices running Windows 10.
